alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch; Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Atkinson, west central Ware and north central Clinch Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 426 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Cogdell, or 11 miles east of Pearson, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Argyle, Cogdell, Manor and Millwood. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
